DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to isolate genotype-specific DBP/Gc from homozygous human volunteers and use these purified proteins to cross-validate existing or novel assays for this serum protein and to evaluate the binding characteristics of these variants of DBP/Gc for different vitamin D metabolites.
DOC.brief_title: Isolation of Vitamin D Binding Protein Isoforms From Human Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy adults (â‰¥ 18 years), non pregnant, with known DBP/Gc genotype Inability to provide written informed consent No children or pregnant women Persons with known abnormal serum proteins
